name: Elite: Dangerous
notes: Download the setup exe by signing in to your Frontier account and visiting the My Downloadable Products page of the Frontier Store.

files.setup: N/A:Select setup exe for Elite Dangerous

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select setup exe for Elite Dangerous
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Frontier/EDLaunch/EDLaunch.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: ie8
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Internet Explorer 8 (necessary!))
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet472
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Dot.NET 4.7.2
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2015
    arch: win64
    description: Installing vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: msls31
    description: Installing MS Line Services
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Arial
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Set Windows version to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Elite Dangerous
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
